title: skobody
author: skobody
content: Offering BTC to zelle, venmo, paypal, apple pay, wire transfer, cashapp, and just about every other payment platform. Also accept all of those payment transfer options to buy BTC as well. International and domestic clients welcome. Fee discussed in Private Message. Also willing to buy other crypto upon request. Telegram: Bcoopfofo. CoinEscrowBot on telegram accepted.
